short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple todo list that also tracks the time you spend on each task.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple todo list chrome extension that gives you the option to track the time you spend on each task. 

If you don't want to deal with those complicated time tracker tools for business and want to track your tasks for personal purposes like see how long it takes to do an assignment then you should try it out!

For example, if I were to write an essay over a period of 4 days and turn on the tracker every time I start he essay, I would be able to get a better understanding of my own productivity and efficiency.
